_description: A fragment of aphoristic verse — three lines (aab)

BLAdd60577.Transcription:
In every beginninghave mynd of the endingyf god permitt it
                    sall

Wilson,  Edward. 
             “Introduction.” 
             The Winchester Anthology. A Facsimile of British Library Additional

                    Iain
